page.title: 12Dunkirk House Garden Centre
page.content: The Garden Centre is a very interesting place with{model gardens and{fountains}in the middle of them. They have weather cockerels and pheasants,peat,rollers,wheelbarrows, {stone ornaments,shrubs,plants,banana, {orange,apple tree,gooseberry bush. Now here are some of the flowers & shrubs that they sell:- {Conifers,Portulacasundance,Hibiscus {Geranium,Begonias,Kangaroo Vine, {Edelweiss,Tennessee Waltz,Herbs,Dill, {Lemon Blam,Chives and Angelica. They also have{holiday flats}which they let to tourists. {Dunkirk House}gets its name from the {wartime connection}with the{evacuation of{British soldiers}from{Dunkirk.
